text: Dorival Knippel (September 28, 1917 – February 15, 1990), was a Brazilian goalkeeper of the 1930s and 1940s, nicknamed Yustrich due to his resemblance to Juan Elias Yustrich, a Boca Juniors goalkeeper at that time. He was born in Corumbá, Mato Grosso do Sul. From 1935 to 1944 he played for Flamengo but became known at national level as a manager for Atlético Mineiro, Cruzeiro EC, Coritiba, Corinthians, Flamengo as well as FC Porto in Portugal. Yustrich also coached Brazil in a single match in 1968. ==Honours== === Players === ;Flamengo * Campeonato Carioca (4): 1939, 1942, 1943, 1944 === Manager === ;América Mineiro * Campeonato Mineiro (1): 1948 ;Atlético Mineiro * Campeonato Mineiro (2): 1952,Yustrich, o disciplinador TV Alterosa, acessado em 11 de abril de 2010 1953 ;Porto * Primeira Liga (1): 1955–56 * Taça de Portugal (1): 1955–56 ;Siderúrgica * Campeonato Mineiro (1): 1964 ;Cruzeiro * Campeonato Mineiro (1): 1977 ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1990 deaths Category:People from Corumbá Category:Brazilian people of German descent Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Brazilian football managers Category:National team coaches Category:Expatriate football managers in Portugal Category:Clube de Regatas do Flamengo footballers Category:CR Vasco da Gama players Category:America Football Club (RJ) players Category:Clube Atlético Mineiro managers Category:FC Porto managers Category:America Football Club (RJ) managers Category:CR Vasco da Gama managers Category:Bangu Atlético Clube managers Category:Brazil national football team managers Category:Clube de Regatas do Flamengo managers Category:América Futebol Clube (MG) managers Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube managers Category:Sport Club Corinthians Paulista managers Category:Coritiba Foot Ball Club managers
title: Yustrich
